channel.title: Bombs cheat client! Free download
channel.description:
[b]Bombs cheat client for players that cant play fair :D[/b]
[b]Download link : http://www.mediafire.com/?ks51wppz1n8xnw9 Tell me when the download link is off! i will put a new one.
Some pics!
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/zisrqa.jpg[/img]
And u can make ur name longer (Anti ban for admins and mods. A owner can see ur Real name and ur ip in his files.)
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2elb6f9.jpg[/img]
100% CREDITS to Bomb that made this nice Cheat client.
[b]Pleas if it isnt on the right place or If i am not allowed to post this (<Cheat client on moparscape forums.) tell it to me in the comments. This only work on 317 servers. You may get a ipban for this if you use it. Also this work only on those dumb servers (No sponserd servers thats sure :D)
Thx for ur time to Read/Download this. (Second topic on this account :)) Pleas dont comment with : Old and gay etc. Very annoying! Any questions? Post in comments or Pm me Thx[/b]
